related_questions.question:
Terjemahkan dengan menggunakan tenses yang tepat    A. Andi memberi makan kucingnya 3 hari yang lalu sebelum kucingnya hilang
B. Jill telah mengemudi selaman enam tahun
C. Sam tidak menghadiri kelas matematika kemarin​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Andi fed his cat 3 days ago before the cat disappeared

A. Andi fed his cat 3 days ago before the cat disappearedB. Jill has been driving for six years

A. Andi fed his cat 3 days ago before the cat disappearedB. Jill has been driving for six yearsC. Sam didn't attend math class yesterday

Jawaban:

Feeds

Penjelasan:

Kalimat tersebut adalah kalimat PRESENT TENSE

Jika ada subject he, she, it. Maka kata kerja nya harus diikuti imbuhan -s ataupun -es. Tetapi jika ada subject i, you, they, we. Maka kata kerja nya tidak diberi imbuhan -s ataupun -es.

Have a nice day :)

related_questions.question: Susi dan susan pergi ke Singapura​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

OCTOGENARIAN PROTEST  

Pensioner Maude Jennings I. celebrated her eightieth birthday outside Avonhurst Town yesterday. She was one of a large group who 2. protests against the plans for a tunnel under the River Severn. Maude's tiny cottage may 3. be demolished when new roads to the tunnel 4. are built. Maude was born in the cottage, which 5. was built in the 18th century, and the entrance of the tunnel will be built at the ends of her garden. Maude /. consulted our reporter, 'I 8. have been told by the planners, and I 9. will never leave my lovely home. I 10. have lived there for eighty years!  

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Simple Past Tense, Simple Present Tense, Present Perfect Tense, Simple Future Tense, Modal Verbs dan Passive Voice.

Simple Past Tense:

Nominal: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Adjective

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-2 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Simple Present Tense:

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-1 S/ES + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (is/am/are) + Verb-3

Present Perfect Tense

(+) Subject + Have/Has + Verb-3

Simple Future Tense:

(+) Subject + Will + Verb-1 + Object

Modal Verbs:

Active: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Verb-1 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Be + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
Change these sentences into simple past tense, baseed on the given Marka in bracket! (number 1 to 3)    1. my family (go) to the cinema last week ( -, ? )

2. the student (study) in the laboratory yesterday ( +, - )

3. she (go) to Bandung two days ago (+, -)

4. the girl was very happy to hear the good news
 ( - ) .......

5. Active voice : the clever student brings a dictionary in his bag
 passive voice :.........​

answers.answer:
1. (-) my family did not go to the cinema last week.

(?) Did my family go to the cinema last week ?

2. (+) the student studied in the laboratory yesterday.

(-) the student did not study in the laboratory yesterday.

3. (+) she went to Bandung two days ago.

(-) she did not go to Bandung two days ago.

4. (-)

5. Passive voice: a dictionary is brought by student in his bag.

cmiiw

related_questions.question:
Buatlah kalimat berikut present perfect tensse

1. She (meet) him.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

She has met him

Penjelasan:

Present perfect tense dipakai untuk menyatakan perbuatan atau situasi yang dimulai di masa lampau dan sudah selesai atau masih terjadi atau masih ada hubungannya dengan masa sekarang. Contoh : I have been a teacher since two years ago. Diana has done her homework.

Jawaban:

she has met him

Penjelasan:

s+have/has+v3, sorry if I'm wrong :)

related_questions.question:
Where is the living room?    a. on the first floor
b. on the basement
c. on the ground floor
d. on the second floor​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

" where is the living room? " ( dimana ruang tamu? )

C. on the ground floor ( dilantai dasar )

Penjelasan:

A. on the first floor ( salah ).

( dilantai pertama ) = bisa dinyatakan lantai pertama setelah lantai dasar

B. on the basement ( salah )

( di ruang bawah tanah ) = yg ditanyakan " dimana ruang tamu? " ruang tamu umumnya terdapat pada lantai dasar.

C. on the ground floor ( benar )

( dilantai dasar ) = ruang tamu terdapat pada lantai dasar.

D. on the second floor ( salah ).

( dilantai kedua ) = dilantai kedua biasanya terdapat kamar

= jadi jawabannya c. on the ground floor
